author: PTI
title: Police tighten vigil in COVID-19 hotspots in Lucknow
description: Police have stepped up vigil and barricades were erected in eight major and four minor COVID-19 hotspots in the Uttar Pradesh capital that have been completely sealed to check the spread of the the deadly virus.
content: Police have stepped up vigil and barricades were erected in eight major and four minor COVID-19 hotspots in the Uttar Pradesh capital that have been completely sealed to check the spread of the the deadly virus. Police teams are carrying out patrolling in the… [+1526 chars]
